mapper.select: SELECT majorName FROM t_major_base_info WHERE collegeID=#{collegeID}

SELECT teacherName FROM t_teacher_base_info
AND majorID = #{majorID}

SELECT teacherID FROM t_teacher_base_info
AND teacherNum = #{teacherNum}
SELECT courseDesignTeacherArrangeID FROM t_courseDesign_teacher_arrange WHERE courseDesignArrangeID = #{courseDesignArrangeID}
SELECT courseDesignArrangeID FROM t_courseDesign_info_arrange WHERE display = #{display}
SELECT courseDesignTeacherArrangeID FROM t_courseDesign_teacher_arrange WHERE display = #{display}
SELECT courseDesignClassArrangeID FROM t_courseDesign_class_arrange WHERE display = #{display}
SELECT courseDesignTeacherStudentID FROM t_courseDesign_TeacherStudent WHERE display = #{display}

SELECT ia.CourseArrangeTime, ta.display, ti.teacherName, ia.yearNum FROM t_courseDesign_teacher_arrange ta JOIN t_teacher_base_info ti ON ta.teacherID = ti.teacherID JOIN t_courseDesign_info_arrange ia ON ia.courseDesignArrangeID = ta.courseDesignArrangeID JOIN t_courseDesign_class_arrange ca ON ca.courseDesignArrangeID = ia.courseDesignArrangeID WHERE ia.trainCourseID = #{trainCourseID} AND ia.yearNum = #{yearNum} AND ia.majorID = #{majorID} AND ca.grade = #{grade}
